name: Minecraft: Experimental Edition
description:
"Minecraft: Experimental Edition" is a custom/modified version of "Minecraft" where childhood is brought back to life, from; growing up and realizing that the features in the game, had to do with super-novels. Including many other things, like: computers, tables, etc.

May not remove all super-novels. Not a actual mod, just a resource-pack, put into a ".jar file." "Minecraft" copyright of 1.8.1, all rights may be reserved.

(May be best to not spoil what it actually is) of version: 1.8.1

Made with: "GNU," "Blockbench"

Made on: "Linux, (Manjaro)"
